click

public void click()
Called by update in SimpleTool when an update request has been fired as a result of a drag event.

First, this method creates a new extent with a click point as a center. Next, it zooms with setted zoomFactor.

Overrides:
click in class SimpleTool

release

public void release()
called when a mouse button has been released. If a valid drag has been made then this method sets the new map extent for the viewer that this tool is attached to.
Overrides:
release in class SimpleTool
Since:
0.7.7.2 07 June 2000

getRubberBandShape

public int getRubberBandShape()
Get the rubber band style to use during drag events for this tool. In this case a rectangle is required.
Overrides:
getRubberBandShape in class SimpleTool
Following copied from class: uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.SimpleTool
Returns:
int A value from above representing a circle, rectangle or line (or none)
